mcq.statement: What is the correct indirect speech for: "He said, 'He will go to Karachi next week.'"

options.a: He said that he will go to Karachi next week.
options.b: He said that he would go to Karachi the following week.
options.c: He said that he had gone to Karachi the next week.
options.d: He said that he goes to Karachi the following week.
